snippet: GoPro shares fell 18 percent in extended trading Wednesday after the wearable-camera maker reported a disappointing financial performance for the third quarter.
abstract: GoPro reports disappointing third-quarter earnings of $18.8 million, up from 414.6 million in year-earlier quarter; shares fall 18 percent on news.
lead_paragraph: GoPro shares fell 18 percent in extended trading Wednesday after the wearable-camera maker reported a disappointing financial performance for the third quarter.

headline.print_headline: GoPro’s Stock Price Declines After Results Disappoint
headline.main: GoPro’s Stock Price Declines After Disappointing Results
